review: Works just as stated and we love it.
author: susier

review: This is so great, even I was able to install this with no trouble!
author: Debra L.

review: I have two of these sticks. I like them, I like the interface etc. But, they both stutter a lot. I have 150mpbs download & 10mpbs upload internet and both sticks are within 20 feet of the router. Youtube & wwe network struggle to stream programs, both audio and video. I don't get it. My Roku stick has 0 problems streaming anything. Anyone else have this problem?
author: Brett Black

review: Bought this for my Son and Grandchildren. They love it. It is such a great value with all the free shows they can choose from, as well as good movies.
author: Sweetie

review: Works well and the graphics are better then I expected.
author: Charles H Egbert

review: I love my new Amazon Fire TV stick. It's so convenient and portable. It's also very user friendly and easy to install. I definitely recommend this product.
